events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and started reviewing their resume and portfolio thoroughly.
The application has been categorized under Engineering since the candidate's experience and skills match the software developer role requirements.
A recruiter has been assigned to handle the candidateâ€™s process, ensuring smooth communication and coordination for upcoming stages.
Conducted initial screening call with the candidate to evaluate their background, motivations, and basic technical knowledge.
Received positive feedback from the candidate expressing enthusiasm to proceed to the next technical interview phase.
Scheduled the technical interview for the candidate with the lead engineer to assess coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview, demonstrating strong coding skills and knowledge of system design.
An HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit, compensation expectations, and general employment terms.
Completed HR interview where candidate expressed alignment with company values and interest in long-term growth opportunities.
A formal offer was proposed to the candidate including salary, benefits, and other key employment conditions.
The candidate responded positively to the offer and requested minor clarifications which were promptly addressed.
The candidate officially accepted the job offer, confirming their commitment to join the engineering team.
The onboarding process was initiated with the new engineer, including setup of workstations and access to company systems.
The recruitment case has been successfully closed with the candidate fully onboarded and integrated into the engineering team.
